title: Al Stewart - Best of Al Stewart (1992) [FLAC]
description:
"The Best of Al Stewart: Songs From the Radio" originally released in 1986 (this version is the remastered re-issue, with the cover pic of Al sitting next to a globe, that's how you'll make the distinction from the earlier version).

The CD covers Al Stewarts most successful period, it stops at 1981 (two live cuts, "On the Border" and the "Nostradamus" medley are from 1981's "Live/Indian Summer"), and only reaches back as far as "Roads to Moscow" from 1974's "Past, Present and Future".

The 1992 remastering gives it wonderful sound.

One of my favourite albums
